venue.name: Johnson Theatre in the Paul Creative Arts Center

item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join us for an evening of comdy and a musical as we watch  a story about a single guy in New York City which serves as the backdrop for this landmark concept musical about relationships, considered by many to have ushered in the modern era of musical theatre.

“Company” follows thirty-something bachelor Robert as he navigates his way through scene after hilarious scene with his several different girlfriends – April (the ditzy stewardess), Kathy (the sweet girl-next-door), and Marta (the assertive "artsy" one) – and his best friends – five married couples – who each cause him to reevaluate his stubbornly single life, and the pros and cons of fully committing to another person.

Lets get together later and talk about the  show over a drink at a local pub!

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: The "Company"
